ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview "The Triangle Trade" Is one of the Shockrocket pilots a traitor? The Shockrockets tackle two missions this time -- one against monsters threatening a human outpost, and one, more sinister, against black marketeers trafficking in alien technology. It's an alliance between human criminals, alien refugees, and the inhuman creatures that live beneath the crust of the Earth -- and someone's got to stop it at its source. But one of the Shockrocket pilots may be working with the black marketeers -- and if that's the case, it could spell disaster for all of them. "The Triangle Trade" provides a look at the dark underbelly of the world of Shockrockets -- while providing new insight into the characters of the pilots and the intrigue that surrounds them. And at the speed they fly, there's no room for false moves!
